Data reading¶

Subband Statistics Data¶

Beamlet Statistics Data¶

class nenupy.read.BST.BST(obsfile)[source]¶
getData(**kwargs)[source]¶

Make the data selection

kwargs : {freq, polar, time, abeam, dbeam}
Keyword arguments
self.d : np.ndarray
Data selected
self.f : np.ndarray
Frequency selected
self.t : np.ndarray
Time selected
plotData(db=True, **kwargs)[source]¶

Plot the data

Note

This function uses the same keyword argument as getData().

Args:
  • db : bool

    We all know what foo does.

Kwargs:
  • freq : float or list

    The frequency in MHz

  • polar : str

    The polarization (‘NE’ or ‘NW’)

  • time : str

    The time

  • abeam : int

  • dbeam : int

Example:
>>> plotData(db=True, freq=50, polar='NE')
